config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration _journalAgeThreshold is used in the code to set the age threshold for the journal. It is passed as a parameter to the PersistentJournal constructor along with other parameters.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _journalAgeThreshold configuration depends on the specific implementation and usage of the journal. It is triggered when creating a new PersistentJournal instance.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _journalAgeThreshold configuration option on the system is that it determines the age threshold for the journal, which can affect the size and performance of the journal over time.
